casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Cedric Theodis HOBBS, Jr. 263PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 22, 2019

John Keating Wiles, Attorney at Law, Raleigh.

Amy Kunstling Irene, Special Deputy Attorney General, William R. West, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Sterling P. Rozear, Assistant Appellate Defender, Cedric Theodis Hobbs, Jr., for Hobbs, Cedric Theodis (Jr.)

Amended

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 18th of April 2019 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of April 2019."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 29th day of May 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
